parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
The name of the document collection.

>  You can call the [CreateDocumentCollection](~~2618448~~) operation to create a document collection and call the [ListDocumentCollections](~~2618452~~) operation to query a list of document collections.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query details about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. Default value: public.

>  You can call the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation to create a namespace and call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: NamespacePassword
parameters.description:
The password of the namespace.

>  This value is specified when you call the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.
